INDEX REVISIONS OVERVIEW FIELD SUMMARY
DATATYPES SQL SUMMARY TRIGGERS
Table : TBL_RF_RECORDFIELDS

The RecordFields Table holds Record Field Details.

  • Each row represents one Field

Field Summary
Name Type Description
RECORDID TBL_R_RECORDS(RECORDID)

Primary Key of the Record Table and part of the key for the RecordFields Table (with SubKey). It links this table to a Record Header.

This key is used internally in the System and not displayed to the user.
SUBKEY smallint

Second part of the Key, this is just a sequence number
FIELDPOS smallint

Field Position - Starting position of the field in the Record
FIELDLENGTH smallint

Field Length
FIELDNAME VarChar30

Field Name
DESCRIPTION VarChar250

Field Description
FIELDTYPE smallint

Field Type ie (Char, Integer etc).

Available types can be retrieved with the following SQL:

select TBLKEY, Details from TBL_TI_INTTBLS where tblid = 1
DECIMALPOS TINYINT

Number of characters after the decimal point
DEFAULTVALUE VarChar15

Default Value - not used
COBOLNAME VarChar30

Cobol Name (if the field was imported from a Cobol Copybook).
FORMATDESCRIPTION VarChar250  
CELL_FORMAT INTEGER

Cell Format id. Possible values are held in Table 4 and can be retrieved with the following SQL

select TBLKEY, Details from TBL_TI_INTTBLS where tblid = 5
PARAMETER VarChar50

Field parameter. Can be used in User Written to get extra information.

For example, If some writes A Generic Date_Type of Date_Format, This field could be used to hold the Date-Format (i.e DDMMYY or DD/MM/YYYY etc).
